listings.title: Degritter Record Cleaning Machine OPEN BOX
listings.description: Not used – this is an open box record cleaning machine in as-new condition with full warranty. Free shipping on this item! Simply our favorite record cleaning machine. Fully automatic with ultra-sonic cleaning and drying all in one. As easy as it gets. 9/10 from 2022.

listings.title: VPI HW-16.5 Record Cleaner USED
listings.description: The classic vacuum record cleaning machine! Excellent. Includes new brush and new cork mat. 8/10 from 2010.

listings.title: Einstein Audio "The Tube" Balanced Preamp USED
listings.description: Strange visitor! Tremendous tube preamplifier. Very unique design, where input has it's own dedicated tubes. The way they do input switching is by powering the filaments on the associated tube for the input you choose - each balanced and unbalanced input has it's own tube on each channel! Check out this glowing review for "The Tube" preamp. 8/10 from 2005.

listings.title: Einstein Audio Light In The Dark Power Amp USED
listings.description: Strange visitor! Fantastic German-made tube power amplifier. 80 watts into 8-ohms. See this 6moons review of the Light In The Dark power amp. 8/10 from 2005.

listings.title: Spin-Clean 45th Anniversary Record Washer USED
listings.description: Complete record cleaning set, only used a couple times. Includes metal drying rack, brushes, fluid, etc. 9/10 from 2022.

listings.title: Sonus Faber Venere S Floorstanding Speakers USED
listings.description: Excellent Italian floorstanders in gloss black. Most musical speakers in the used room at – or near – this price. One owner, in immaculate shape. 9/10 from 2020. Store pickup only.

listings.title: Sonus Faber Olympica III Floorstanding Speakers USED
listings.description: These Italian speakers are highly regarded, and for good reason! They're musical, fun and well balanced. Highly recommended. This pair is in walnut finish. Original boxes included - email us for shipping quote. 9/10 from 2020.

listings.title: Heed Lagrange Integrated Amp USED
listings.description: This thing is AWESOME! Killer eastern-European-made integrated amp. Heed has graduated from the half-sized boxes and made a transcap integrated amplifier with MM phono and Bluetooth built in that is a giant killer. Sorry, I know that term gets thrown around like trash, but it's true. Listen to this one! Includes remote control and factory box. 9/10 from 2020.

listings.title: Focal JMLabs Cobalt SW 800S Subwoofer USED
listings.description: Amazing larger French-made subwoofer. Front firing, 175 watts. 7/10 from 2003. Store pickup only - it's really big!

listings.title: REL Storm III Subwoofer Cherry USED
listings.description: Excellent larger UK subwoofer. Downfiring. 150 watts. Very musical and quick. 7/10 from 2000.

listings.title: Naim Audio DAC FACTORY REFURBISHED
listings.description: Not used – this is Naim Factory Refurbished DAC in as-new condition with full warranty and all accessories. We opened the box to demo, but it was sealed as of July 22. Free shipping on this item! The Naim DAC is still one of our favorites of all time, plus it's upgradable with the XP5, XPS, or 555PS power supply, bringing even more oomph to your digital music! 9/10 from 2022.

listings.title: JVC QL-5 Turntable USED
listings.description: Super hefty and awesome Japanese turntable. Fully manual, direct drive. 8/10 from 1982. Store pickup only.

listings.title: Spectral Audio DMC-30SC Preamp USED
listings.description: Extraordinary transparency from this high end and well regarded preamp. One owner. Includes factory box and remote control. For more information, see Spectral Audio's DMC-30SC product page. 9/10 from 2018.

listings.title: EMM Labs DAC2X V2 DAC USED
listings.description: Extraordinary high end DAC from Ed Meitner. Designed and manufactured in Canada! Originally from 2016, updated to V2 in 2018. One owner. Includes power cable, but no factory box. For more info, see EMM Labs' DAC 2X V2 product page. 9/10 from 2016.

listings.title: Pioneer RT-707 Reel-To-Reel Deck USED
listings.description: This RT-707 was fully restored by J-Corder a few years ago and is ready to roll... AND rock! 8/10 from 1980.

listings.title: Adcom GFA-535 Power Amp USED
listings.description: 60-watt workhorse of a power amp. 7/10 from 1988.

listings.title: Adcom GFA-545 Power Amp USED
listings.description: 100-watt per channel power amp. These guys are workhorses! 8/10 from 1989.

listings.title: Parasound HCA-1200II Power Amp USED
listings.description: USA-designed 205-watt power amplifier. 7/10 from 1996.

listings.title: Onkyo TX-930 Receiver USED
listings.description: Basic 80-watt receiver with phono input and AM/FM. 7/10 from 2001.

listings.title: Denon DRA-395 Receiver USED
listings.description: Basic 80 watt receiver with phono input and AM/FM radio. 7/10 from 2001.

listings.title: Sherwood S-7100A Receiver USED
listings.description: These 17-watt classic receivers were beloved by our dear late found, Robert. So cool! 7/10 from 1974.

listings.title: McIntosh MR78 Tuner USED
listings.description: Very sweet McIntosh tuner in wood case. This was completely gone through by Audio Classics in 2012 and includes manual and factory box. Looks excellent, with a few minor imperfections. 8/10 from mid-70s.

listings.title: Rotel RA-1060 Integrated Amp USED
listings.description: Great slim integrated amp. All line level (no phono input). No remote control included. 7/10 from 2001.

listings.title: Onkyo TX-844 Receiver USED
listings.description: Basic 60-watt receiver with phono and AM/FM. 7/10 from ~1990.

listings.title: McIntosh C712 Preamp USED
listings.description: Slim and excellent preamplifier with remote control and phono input. 8/10 from 1995.

listings.title: Aragon 28k Preamp USED
listings.description: Wow! Very nice sounding line level preamplifier with remote control. 7/10 from 1997.

listings.title: APT Holman Preamp USED
listings.description: Very cool classic preamp. 7/10 from 1979.

listings.title: Naim Audio NAP 250 DR Power Amplifier USED
listings.description: THE classic Naim amplifier. Current model that sells for $7,899 new! While this was not recapped as it is too new to require it, we're throwing this in the Dominic's Delicacies as it's just TOO GOOD! 9/10 from 2017.

listings.title: Marantz CD6007 CD Player USED
listings.description: Our favorite sub-$1,000 CD player. Like new with remote control and factory box. 9/10 from 2021.

listings.title: IsoAcoustics Carpet Discs For GAIA III USED
listings.description: Carpet discs for Gaia III speaker isolation feet. 2 sets available. 8/10 from 2019.

listings.title: Naim Audio XPS DR Power Supply USED
listings.description: Supercharge your Naim digital streamer or DAC with this amazing current model power supply. Includes new Naim Burndy interconnect and manual. Sells for $7,499 new! While this was not recapped as it is too new to require it, we're throwing this in Dominic's Delicacies section because it's just too cool. 9/10 from 2015.

listings.title: AudioQuest Rocket 11 Speaker Cables USED
listings.description: 8' pair of AudioQuest speaker wire with BFA/banana combo connectors on each end. 8/10 from 2019.

listings.title: Chord Shawline Analog Cable XLR Pair 1m OPEN BOX
listings.description: Open box discount! Used only in store or at a trade show. Full warranty, full savings! 9/10 from ~2021.

listings.title: Dynaudio Connect Wireless Transmitter OPEN BOX
listings.description: Not used – this is an open box item in as-new condition with full warranty. Free shipping on this item! Wireless transmitter for use with Dynaudio XEO active speakers. 9/10 from 2021.

listings.title: Rega Ela Floorstanding Speakers USED
listings.description: Fantastic early-era Rega floorstanding speakers. Extraordinarily musical. Fantastic with folk and jazz. Not the most bass in the world, but very good bass. They have it where it counts. 7/10 from 1994. Store pickup only.

listings.title: Dynaudio Xeo 20 Powered Bookshelf Speakers OPEN BOX
listings.description: Not used – these are an open box pair in as-new condition with full warranty. Free shipping on this item! Two-way wireless active powered bookshelf speakers. 9/10 from 2021.

listings.title: Klipsch Heritage Heresy IV Floorstanding Speakers USED
listings.description: Killer horn loaded new classics. Beautiful walnut pair. 8/10 from 2019. Store pickup only!

listings.title: Dynaudio Xeo 10 Powered Bookshelf Speakers OPEN BOX
listings.description: Not used – these are an open box pair in as-new condition with full warranty. Free shipping on this item! Two-way wireless active powered bookshelf speakers. 9/10 from 2021.

listings.title: Rega Aria Mk.3 MM/MC Phono Preamp USED
listings.description: Shop favorite! This is the only phono stage you'll ever need. MM plus adjustable MC. Separate inputs for MM and MC allows you to switch between two turntables. Lovely sounding. Made in the UK. 8/10 from 2020.

listings.title: Grado GS1000 Headphones USED
listings.description: Quite special! Fantastic hifi headphones with box, 3.5mm adapter, and extension cable. 8/10 from 2007.

listings.title: Grado Prestige SR125e Headphones USED
listings.description: Excellent open on-ear headphoens. Last year's model at last century's price! 8/10 from 2018.

listings.title: Rayad SP-1 Bookshelf Speakers USED
listings.description: Boise's own! This smaller company made some pretty nice little speakers in the '80s! Small two-way bookshelves with soft dome tweeter. 7/10 from the '80s.

listings.title: KEF Q10 Bookshelf Speakers USED
listings.description: Your garage will sound great! This pair of English-made speakers is cosmetically imperfect but nice sounding, thus the pretty nice price.

listings.title: KEF Reference 107/2 Floorstanding Speakers USED
listings.description: Wow! These things are very hard to beat, if you've got the room for them. These are in nice shape and sounding absolutely wonderful. Cosmetics: 7/10 (quite good, some minor imperfections) Year: About 1990 Shipping: Store pickup only. Freight could be arranged, will likely be about $600.

listings.title: Klipsch KG2 Bookshelf Speakers USED
listings.description: Sweet walnut classics! These are the rare Klipsch with a soft dome tweeter. The result: A more laid back, and dare I say balanced, sound. Stands included! 8/10 from 1985. Store pickup only.

listings.title: LEAK Stereo 130 Integrated Amp USED
listings.description: The return of a British classic! 45 watts per channel with phono, DAC, Bluetooth. At time of posting, matching CD transport also available. 9/10 from 2021.

listings.title: LEAK CDT CD Transport USED
listings.description: Super cool CD transport in walnut case with remote control. Box available. At time of posting, matching used integrated amp also available. 9/10 from 2021.

listings.title: NAD 3155 Integrated Amp USED
listings.description: Excellent 55-watt integrated amp with MM/MC phono input. Made in Japan. 7/10 from 1985.

listings.title: Monitor Audio Bronze BX2 Bookshelf Speakers USED
listings.description: Excellent UK-designed black bookshelf speakers. Great sounding for the money! 7/10 from 2010.

listings.title: Naim Audio Uniti Nova All-In-One USED
listings.description: Perhaps the best all-in-one sreamer amplifier out there. Killer sound, wonderful app. Supports Tidal, Qobuz and Spotify natively, along with Internet Radio, Airplay, Chromecast, and Bluetooth. Highly recommended at the new price, let alone this crazy used price! Jack Roberts approved price* 8/10 from 2021. *Jack Roberts did not actually approve of this price, but I'd like to think he would approve of it and this special asterisk.
